    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public static void validate(java.lang.String filePath)
        Checks if the file has any blanks in the rows. If blanks are present, it adds the error into an error log to be released containing its row number and column blank.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file name to be entered

      • checkForBlanks

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> checkForBlanks(java.lang.String[] eachRow)
        Checks if the entry in each field is blank.
        Parameters:
        eachRow - is an array storing all entries for one row of the file being checked
        Returns:
        an arrayList of Integer that contains column numbers that are blank for the field

        Parameters:
        errorColumn - is an arrayList of Integer of the column numbers that has an error

        rowNum - is the row number of the row which the error exists at

      • checkEDollars

                                    java.lang.String courseID,
                                    double stud_eDollars)

        bidAmount - a String that contains the value of the bid amount
        sectionID - a String containing the section ID of the section to be checked
        courseID - Takes in courseID of String type
        stud_eDollars - a String that contains the user's eDollars
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if the user has enough eDollars to bid, returns false if otherwise

                                             java.lang.String sectionID,
                                             java.lang.String courseID)

        Parameters:
        userID - a String containing the user ID of the user to be checked
        sectionID - Takes in sectionID of String type
        courseID - a String containing the course ID of the course to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if the bid is going to override the previous bid, returns false if otherwise

        stud_eDollars - a String that contains the user's eDollars

                                 java.lang.String errorType,

        Adds a list of errors for each row and into a collated map of error logs for all rows.
        Parameters:
        errorColumn - contains a List of column numbers with errors
        errorType - is a String that determines the errorType
        rowNum - is an Integer that determines the row number of the errors
